item.title: Tips for Developing a Static Site Using Hugo
item.description: intro: been asked how this blog is written and maintained. I use hugo (explain what that is) thought I’d collate my findings over a couple of over a year of working with hugo. also useful for non-blog use cases, and I’ve used hugo personally in orgs that used hugo for internal and external doc sites and wikis. i’ll mention practical advice on working with hugo ðŸ’» set up your environment to work with hugo well I use VSCode.
